sentences: During informal consultations on a shared vision, parties focused on a long-term global goal for emission reductions and review of a shared vision.
Several countries envisaged a long-term global goal in terms of stabilization of greenhouse gas concentrations, limitation of temperature increase and quantified emission reductions.
Several parties also underlined peaking times and a basis in science as assessed by the IPCC.
Several countries stressed that a long-term global goal covers all building blocks.
Numbers proposed by parties for each element of a shared vision varied.
On review, parties discussed a review mechanism and timing of the review.
